GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object

DONE

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

== Basic Actions ==

  - Move to a specific location or object

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>

DONE
  - Finish the task

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==

OPEN <object_id>

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>

  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>

  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>

TURN_OFF <object_id>

  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.

Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>

  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==

OPEN <object_id>

TURN_ON <object_id>

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>

  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

  - Turns off a device.

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

GOTO <object_id>

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>

  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE

  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==

OPEN <object_id>

TURN_ON <object_id>

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>

  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==

OPEN <object_id>

TURN_ON <object_id>

  - Move to a specific location or object

Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

  - Move to a specific location or object

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>

  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

OPEN <object_id>

  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>

  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==

OPEN <object_id>

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>

  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

  - Move to a specific location or object

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>

  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

== Basic Actions ==

  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1
